sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form id="guestbook-comp">

    <label for="name">Name: </label>
    <input type="text" id="name" v-model="name" />

    <label for="message">Message: </label>
    <textarea id="message" v-model="message"></textarea>

    <label for="date">Date: </label>
    <input type="date" id="date" v-model="date" />

    <button id="submit-button" @click.prevent="submitEntry">Submit</button>

  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "SubmitGuestBookEntry",

  data() {
    return {
      name: "",
      message: "",
      date: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    submitEntry() {
      const guestBookEntry = {
        name: this.name,
        message: this.message,
        date: this.date,
      };
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style>
#guestbook-comp {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  height: 100%;
}

#guestbook-comp input {
  width: 50%;
  margin: 10px;
}

#guestbook-comp textarea {
  width: 50%;
  height: 100px;
  margin: 10px;
}

#submit-button {
  width: 52%;
  margin: 10px;
}

</style>
